hero.title: Art <1>school</1> for the AI era.
hero.titlePlain: Art school for the AI era.
hero.subtitle: Where World Creators Meet.

rupture.title: We are living a rupture comparable to the invention of writing.
rupture.paragraph2: What remains is what has always been essential:
rupture.conclusion1: This is not learned in tutorials.

studio.title: STUDIO
studio.description: Creative direction for founders and personal brands.

playground.title: PLAYGROUND
playground.description: Public space to experience, test, immerse.

manifesto.tagline: Not everything that matters is visible —

clones.title: Talk to <1>minds</1> that changed the world
clones.titlePlain: Talk to minds that changed the world
clones.subtitle: Cognitive clones trained with decades of thought, philosophy and wisdom.

david-lynch.subtitle: Master of Consciousness
david-lynch.description: Visionary filmmaker. Creator of Twin Peaks and Mulholland Drive.

neil-gaiman.subtitle: Master Storyteller
neil-gaiman.description: Master of stories. Author of Sandman and American Gods.

ursula-le-guin.subtitle: Master of Worlds
ursula-le-guin.description: Master of science fiction. Author of Earthsea.

tayna-puri.subtitle: Ancestral Future
tayna-puri.description: Brazilian thinker. Creator of the Ancestral Future philosophy.

futuroAncestral.title: ANCESTRAL FUTURE
futuroAncestral.line1: We use technology from the future
futuroAncestral.line2: to reveal truths that have always existed.
futuroAncestral.comparison: Like fire. Like writing. Like language.

entry.line2: Not every work needs to exist.
entry.line3: But if you've come this far,
